name: Lady Blue
description: The Lady Blue Is a hand made clothing shop Focused primarily in women. Their online sales were all made via social media, and they wanted to give the next step, so they contacted me to design, develop, and create their online shop. It was a one month project since the research until the implementation.

caseStudy.title: Product definition
caseStudy.description: I interviewed the owner so we could figure out the key aspects and value proposition of the product. After that, I created an early mockup of the future product.

caseStudy.title: Research
caseStudy.description: These phase is the most variable between projects. It depends on the complexity of the product, timing, available resources and many other factors. In this case, I started with competitive research. It helped me understand these industry standards.

caseStudy.title: Analysis
caseStudy.description: In this phase we create user personas. You can reference these personas as realistic representations of our target audience. I then created user journeys. It helped me understand the user's point of view.

caseStudy.title: Wireframes
caseStudy.description: After we gather all the information need, we can directly jump into creating wireframes.

caseStudy.title: Design
caseStudy.description: After we gather all the information need, we can directly jump into creating wireframes and after that, start our mockups.
